solution_line_template: Caleb was left with {original_puffs} - {given_to_mom} - {given_to_sister} - {given_to_grandmother} - {given_to_dog} = <<{original_puffs}-{given_to_mom}-{given_to_sister}-{given_to_grandmother}-{given_to_dog}={remaining_puffs}>>{remaining_puffs} dandelion puffs to give to his friends.
